name: Evan Huus
tagline: Developer, euphoniumist, singer, actor, settler of Catan. Human being, depending on the weather. Fifth business.
body:
The tag line says it all, really.

If you're interested in philosophical ramblings, my blog: [Grand Unified Crazy](https://grandunifiedcrazy.wordpress.com/)

### Development

I have been a core developer of [Wireshark](https://wireshark.org/) since 2012. I designed and wrote the original version of the [Sarama library](https://github.com/Shopify/sarama).

### Papers

I have written a couple of academic-y papers (on computer science topics) that you might be interested in:
* [Breaking Symmetry with Agents of Different Speeds](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/171647/Huus2013_Breaking_Symmetry.pdf) (April, 2013)
* [Ecological Interface Design: Practical Applications to the Wireshark Network Analyzer](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/171647/Huus2013_Wireshark_HCI.pdf) (December, 2013)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
